section.description: The Inventory form demonstrates the following controls and techniques:

case.description: Using a Tabbed Control to Selectively Display Controls demonstrates an excellent solution for displaying a set of related controls in a small amount of space.
Using Field Rules to Generate a Table Lookup demonstrates how field rules can create a lookup table.
Opening a Filtered Browse on another Form demonstrates how to open a filtered browse on another form.
